segments.text: Let ’ s try to get out of the supermarket quickly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I hate spending all day in there , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do we need ? Let ’ s make a list .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We need milk , eggs , butter , coffee , vegetables , fruit , bread , cheese , and some snacks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want some pickles , oh , and we ’ re out of flour . Put that on the list , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not that I can think of . Wait a second , we ’ re out of breakfast cereal . I think corn flakes are on sale . Get those .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you get those . I ’ ll go and get the fruits , vegetables , milk , butter , and eggs , you get the rest .
segments.speaker: S2
